title: Average ticket price Indiana Pacers ( NBA ) games 2015/16
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: In general Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has fallen over the Year.
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2008/09 to 2009/10, and lastly roughly constant from 2009/10 to 2012/13.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008/09 and 2009/10.
Maximum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, about 41.09 was reported at Year 2008/09
Minimum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 29.13 was reached at Year 2010/11
